name: Brand Context
description: Reusable element that provides brand and project context at the start of prompts
usageNotes: Place at the beginning of prompts to establish brand and project context. This element helps the AI understand the scope and focus of the analysis.

examples.output:
=== PROJECT CONTEXT ===

BRAND: Nike
PROJECT TYPE: Product Innovation
TIMESTAMP: 2025-02-08

This analysis is being conducted for Nike as part of a Product Innovation initiative.
